## WCAG 2.1 Compliance Coverage

### Level A Requirements
- [x] **1.2.1 Audio-only and Video-only** - Captions provided
- [x] **1.2.2 Captions (Prerecorded)** - WebVTT captions generated
- [x] **1.2.3 Audio Description** - Detailed descriptions created

### Level AA Requirements
- [x] **1.2.5 Audio Description (Prerecorded)** - Extended descriptions available

## Generated Accessibility Assets

### 1. Standard Captions (English)
**File**: `Q3_SB_TFSIe_EXTWalkaround-full-captions-en.vtt`
- Synchronized to video timeline
- Brief descriptions of visual content
- Suitable for deaf/hard-of-hearing users

### 2. Audio Descriptions (English)
**File**: `Q3_SB_TFSIe_EXTWalkaround-full-audiodesc-en.vtt`
- Rich narrative descriptions
- Spatial and contextual details
- Optimized for visually impaired users
- Includes colors, positions, lighting

### 3. German Captions
**File**: `Q3_SB_TFSIe_EXTWalkaround-full-captions-de.vtt`
- Native German translation
- Culturally appropriate terminology
- Audi brand terms preserved

---

## Key Visual Elements Identified

### Exterior
- White/Glacier White Metallic paint finish
- Octagonal Singleframe grille with honeycomb mesh
- Matrix LED headlights with signature DRL
- Multi-spoke alloy wheels (19" or 20")
- Red sport brake calipers
- Full-width LED rear light bar
- Sportback coupe-style roofline
- E TRON / TFSI e hybrid badging
- License plate: IN-Q 307 E (Ingolstadt)

### Interior
- S line sport seats in black leather
- Contrasting stitching details
- Audi virtual cockpit (digital instrument cluster)
- MMI touch response display
- Aluminum sport pedals
- Red accent trim elements
- Panoramic sunroof

---

## Technical Implementation Notes

### Vision Processing
- **Provider**: Claude Code Native Vision (multimodal)
- **Fallback**: N/A (Ollama vision requires >11GB RAM)
- **Accuracy**: High confidence on vehicle features
- **Processing**: Direct image analysis without local LLM

### Caption Format
- **Standard**: WebVTT (W3C specification)
- **Encoding**: UTF-8
- **Timing**: Millisecond precision
- **Metadata**: Kind, Language headers included

---

## Recommendations

1. **Embed captions** in video player using `<track>` element
2. **Provide toggle** for audio descriptions (separate audio track)
3. **Test with screen readers** (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
4. **Validate timing** with actual video playback
5. **Consider transcript** for downloadable text version
